Text.text: With this, the first public release of the Predictive Console, Forefront Analytics brings predictive forecasting to your finger tips. This Beta realse focuses on intuitive and easy time series forecasting, visualisation, and simple modifications of forecast results, right in the visualisation.
- Social authentication/log in, to simplify application access
- Simple payment options for paid plans
- HANA, CSV, Google Sheets, AWS Redshift, Hadoop data sources
- Interactive charting library, for smooth, fast visualisations
- embedded support service for paid users
- forecast folder organisation and forecast search
